title: Mastery Rank - S Grade
body:
Not sure whether this has been discussed previously, but I am really disappointed with the current mastery rank system. You can be rank 5 (or now even 6 or 7) with a character and still be terrible, it just shows that you've played the character a lot.

So what I propose, and I'd love feedback etc, is that there is a separate mastery rank available that you can only acquire through achieving S grades in games. Then that rank would mean something and you would have something to strive for with your favourite characters.

Also happy to consider the possibility of skins that cost RP, but that are only available to players who have achieved certain S grade mastery ranks with characters. 

What does everyone think of these ideas?

replies.body: Rank 6 and 7 can only be achieved by getting S ranks. S- through to S+ for Rank 6 and S and S+ only for Rank 7.
U mean for Rank 5 masteries? Since Ranks 6-7 actually require getting S grades which mean you have to be good at that champ
